Stripe.name: Stripe
Stripe.description: Stripe offers online payment processing for internet businesses as well as fraud prevention, invoicing and subscription management.

PayPal.name: PayPal
PayPal.description: PayPal is an online payments system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders.

Braintree.name: Braintree
Braintree.description: Braintree, a division of PayPal, specializes in mobile and web payment systems for ecommerce companies. Braintree provides clients with a merchant account and a payment gateway.

Razorpay.name: Razorpay
Razorpay.description: Razorpay is a provider of an online payment gateway that allows businesses to accept, process, and disburse payments.

Checkout.com.name: Checkout.com
Checkout.com.description: Checkout.com is an international payment platform that processes different payment methods across a variety of currencies.

Square.name: Square
Square.description: Square is a mobile payment company that offers business software, payment hardware products and small business services.

Affirm.name: Affirm
Affirm.description: Affirm is a loan company that allows users to buy goods or services offered by online merchants and pay off those purchases in fixed monthly payments.

Afterpay.name: Afterpay
Afterpay.description: Afterpay is a 'buy now, pay later' platform that makes it possible to pay off purchased goods in fortnightly instalments.

Amazon Pay.name: Amazon Pay
Amazon Pay.description: Amazon Pay is an online payments processing service that is owned by Amazon. It lets you use the payment methods associated with your Amazon account to make payments for goods and services.

American Express.name: American Express
American Express.description: American Express, also known as Amex, facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world, most commonly through branded credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards.

Amex Express Checkout.name: Amex Express Checkout
Amex Express Checkout.description: Amex Express Checkout is a service that simplifies the checkout experience by auto-filling necessary cardholder payment data into merchant checkout fields.

Aplazame.name: Aplazame
Aplazame.description: Aplazame is a consumer credit company that provides instant financing service for online purchases. It combines an overtime payment method integrated at the ecommerce checkout with marketing tools to enable ecommerce to use financing as a promotional lever to boost sales.

Apple Pay.name: Apple Pay
Apple Pay.description: Apple Pay is a mobile payment and digital wallet service by Apple that allows users to make payments in person, in iOS apps, and on the web.

Bolt Payments.name: Bolt Payments
Bolt Payments.description: Bolt powers a checkout experience designed to convert shoppers.

Bread.name: Bread
Bread.description: Bread is a buy now, pay later platform for ecommerce websites.

ChargeAfter.name: ChargeAfter
ChargeAfter.description: ChargeAfter is a platform that connects retailers and lenders to offer consumers personalized Point of Sale Financing options at checkout from multiple lenders.

Chargebee.name: Chargebee
Chargebee.description: Chargebee is a PCI Level 1 certified recurring billing platform for SaaS and subscription-based businesses.

CitrusPay.name: CitrusPay
CitrusPay.description: CitrusPay provides payement gateway and wallet services.

Conekta.name: Conekta
Conekta.description: Conekta is a Mexican payment platform.

Cybersource.name: Cybersource
Cybersource.description: Cybersource is an ecommerce credit card payment system solution.

Divido.name: Divido
Divido.description: Divio is a Buy now pay later solution. Divido provided whitelabel platform connects lenders, retailers and channel partners at the point of sale

eWAY Payments.name: eWAY Payments
eWAY Payments.description: eWAY is a global omnichannel payment provider. The company processes secure credit card payments for merchants. eWay works through eCommerce.

Fat Zebra.name: Fat Zebra
Fat Zebra.description: Fat Zebra provides a process of accepting credit card payments online.

Forte.name: Forte
Forte.description: Forte, a CSG Company offers merchants and partners a broad range of payment solutions.

Four.name: Four
Four.description: Pay with four is a Buy now pay later solution.

Google Pay.name: Google Pay
Google Pay.description: Google Pay is a digital wallet platform and online payment system developed by Google to power in-app and tap-to-pay purchases on mobile devices, enabling users to make payments with Android phones, tablets or watches.

Grab Pay Later.name: Grab Pay Later
Grab Pay Later.description: Grab Pay Later is a buy now pay later solution offered by Grab.

Heartland Payment Systems.name: Heartland Payment Systems
Heartland Payment Systems.description: Heartland Payment Systems is a US-based payment processing and technology provider.

Iamport.name: Iamport
Iamport.description: Iamport is an information technology company based in South Korea.

JUST.name: JUST
JUST.description: JUST is a one-click payment solution for online business and online shoppers.

Klarna Checkout.name: Klarna Checkout
Klarna Checkout.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete payment solution where Klarna handles a store's entire checkout.

Klasha.name: Klasha
Klasha.description: Klasha is a payment solution provider that handles a store's entire checkout.

Laterpay.name: Laterpay
Laterpay.description: Laterpay is a service that simplifies payments on the Internet. In addition to the classic immediate purchase option, Laterpay also allows you to buy digital content such as articles or videos now and pay later.

Liberapay.name: Liberapay
Liberapay.description: Liberapay is a non-profit organisation subscription payment platform.

Mastercard.name: Mastercard
Mastercard.description: MasterCard facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world, most commonly through branded credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards.

Mokka.name: Mokka
Mokka.description: Mokka is a Buy Now Pay Later solution that connects target customer acquisition and settlement costs through marketing and promotion.

Mollie.name: Mollie
Mollie.description: Mollie is a payment provider for Belgium and the Netherlands, offering payment methods such as credit card, iDEAL, Bancontact/Mister cash, PayPal, SCT, SDD, and others.

Moneris.name: Moneris
Moneris.description: Moneris (formerly Moneris Solutions) is Canada's largest financial technology company that specialises in payment processing.

mobicred.name: mobicred
mobicred.description: Mobicred is a credit facility that allows you to safely shop online with our participating retailers.

Omise.name: Omise
Omise.description: Omise is a payment gateway for Thailand, Japan and Singapore. Providing both online and offline payment solutions to merchants.

OpenPay.name: OpenPay
OpenPay.description: Openpay is an innovative online and in-store payment solution enabling you to purchase now and pay later, with no interest.

Ordergroove.name: Ordergroove
Ordergroove.description: Ordergroove provides a SaaS (Software as a Service) based subscription and membership commerce platform.

Pace.name: Pace
Pace.description: PacePay offers a BNPL (Buy now pay later) solution for merchants.

Paddle.name: Paddle
Paddle.description: Paddle is a billing and payment gateway for B2B SaaS companies.

PagSeguro.name: PagSeguro
PagSeguro.description: PagSeguro is an online or mobile payment-based ecommerce service for commercial operations.

Pagar.me.name: Pagar.me
Pagar.me.description: Pagar.me is a Portuguese-language online payments solution for businesses in Brazil.

Paidy.name: Paidy
Paidy.description: Paidy is basically a two-sided payments service, acting as a middleman between consumers and merchants in Japan.

Partial.ly.name: Partial.ly
Partial.ly.description: Partial.ly payment plan software lets businesses offer customizable payment plans to their customers.

PayBright.name: PayBright
PayBright.description: PayBright is a Canadian fintech company that offers short-term interest-free installment loans for online shopping to consumers at checkout.

Payflex.name: Payflex
Payflex.description: Payflex offers an online payment gateway solution to South African merchants that allows shoppers to pay over 6 weeks, interest-free.

Payl8r.name: Payl8r
Payl8r.description: PayL8r.com offers repayment plans and online finance which allow you to purchase products online.

Paysafe.name: Paysafe
Paysafe.description: Paysafe is a payment platform that enables businesses and consumers to connect and transact by payment processing, digital wallet, and online cash solutions.

Pin Payments.name: Pin Payments
Pin Payments.description: Pin Payments is an all-in-one online payment system. It offers merchants a simple JSON API, secure credit card storage, multi-currency capabilities, bank account compatibility, onsite payment processing and automatic fund transfer to specified bank accounts.

Plaid.name: Plaid
Plaid.description: Plaid is a fintech company that facilitates communication between financial services apps and users' banks and credit card providers.

Recharge.name: Recharge
Recharge.description: Recharge is the a subscription payments platform designed for merchants to set up and manage dynamic recurring billing across web and mobile.

Recurly.name: Recurly
Recurly.description: Recurly provides enterprise-class subscription billing and recurring payment management for thousands of businesses worldwide.

Scalapay.name: Scalapay
Scalapay.description: Scalapay is a payment method for e-commerce merchants in Europe that allows customers to buy now and pay later (BNPL).

Service Provider Pro.name: Service Provider Pro
Service Provider Pro.description: Service Provider Pro is a client management & billing software for productized service agencies.

Shop Pay.name: Shop Pay
Shop Pay.description: Shop Pay is an accelerated checkout that lets customers save their email address, credit card, and shipping and billing information so they can complete their transaction faster the next time they are directed to the Shopify checkout.

SkyVerge.name: SkyVerge
SkyVerge.description: SkyVerge  is a company which develop extension tools for WooCommerce stores.

SplitIt.name: SplitIt
SplitIt.description: SplitIt is a payment solution that divides a purchase into smaller monthly installments.

Spotii.name: Spotii
Spotii.description: Spotii is a tech-enabled payments platform where anyone can Shop Now and Pay Later with absolutely zero interest or cost.

SpurIT Partial Payments App.name: SpurIT Partial Payments App
SpurIT Partial Payments App.description: SpurIT Partial Payments App allow your customers to pay for the order in several ways or to share a payment with other people.

SpurIT Recurring Payments App.name: SpurIT Recurring Payments App
SpurIT Recurring Payments App.description: SpurIT Recurring Payments App is a simple way to create a system of bill payment,subscriptions and invoicing.

T1 Pagos.name: T1 Pagos
T1 Pagos.description: T1 Pagos is a payment processing platform.

TNS Payments.name: TNS Payments
TNS Payments.description: TNS Payments, is designed to deliver payment transaction information to banks, merchants, processors and other payment institutions.

Tabby.name: Tabby
Tabby.description: Tabby is a Buy now pay later solution from Middle East.

Tamara.name: Tamara
Tamara.description: Tamara ia a BNPL (Buy now pay later) provider in Saudi Arabia.

Venmo.name: Venmo
Venmo.description: Venmo is a mobile payment service owned by PayPal. Venmo account holders can transfer funds to others via a mobile phone app.

Verifone 2Checkout.name: Verifone 2Checkout
Verifone 2Checkout.description: Verifone is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Coral Springs, Florida, that provides technology for electronic payment transactions and value-added services at the point-of-sale.

Visa Checkout.name: Visa Checkout
Visa Checkout.description: Visa facilitates electronic funds transfers throughout the world, most commonly through Visa-branded credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards.

Wirecard.name: Wirecard
Wirecard.description: Wirecard is a defunct German payment processor and financial services provider.

Xpresslane.name: Xpresslane
Xpresslane.description: Xpresslane is a checkout platform for ecommerce that focuses on increasing conversion during the checkout process.

YooMoney.name: YooMoney
YooMoney.description: YooMoney is an IT company working with electronic payments on the Internet, creating and supporting financial services for individuals and businesses.

Zip.name: Zip
Zip.description: Zip is a payment service that lets you receive your purchase now and spread the total cost over a interest-free payment schedule.

Blackbaud Luminate Online.name: Blackbaud Luminate Online
Blackbaud Luminate Online.description: Blackbaud Luminate Online provides online fundraising and marketing automation for nonprofits.

Binance Pay.name: Binance Pay
Binance Pay.description: Binance Pay is a contactless, borderless, and secure cryptocurrency payment technology designed by Binance.

Bitcoin.name: Bitcoin
Bitcoin.description: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency, without a central bank or single administrator, that can be sent from user to user on the peer-to-peer bitcoin network without the need for intermediaries.

bSecure.name: bSecure
bSecure.description: bSecure is a one-click checkout solution for selling your products all across the globe instantly.

Catch.name: Catch
Catch.description: Catch is a payment solution which allows merchants to use payments via bank payments instead of credit/debit cards.

Coinbase Commerce.name: Coinbase Commerce
Coinbase Commerce.description: Coinbase Commerce is a platform that enables merchants to accept cryptocurrency payments.

Facebook Pay.name: Facebook Pay
Facebook Pay.description: Facebook pay is a payment solution which can be used on any site or app outside Facebook ecosystem.

Instamojo.name: Instamojo
Instamojo.description: Instamojo is a Bangalore-based company that provides a platform for selling digital goods and collecting payment online.

iyzico.name: iyzico
iyzico.description: iyzico is a payment receipt system management platform that offers ePayment solutions.

Juspay.name: Juspay
Juspay.description: Juspay is a developer of an online platform designed to be used for mobile-based payments.

POLi Payment.name: POLi Payment
POLi Payment.description: POLi Payment(formerly known as Centricom) is an online payment service in Australia and New Zealand.

PayFast.name: PayFast
PayFast.description: PayFast is a payments processing service for South Africans & South African websites.

PayWhirl.name: PayWhirl
PayWhirl.description: PayWhirl provides widgets and tools to handle recurring payments.

Simpl.name: Simpl
Simpl.description: Simpl is a fintech company that offers a cardless payment network with multiple solutions for merchants and consumers.

WorldPay.name: WorldPay
WorldPay.description: WorldPay is a merchant services and payment processing provider offering a payment gateway for online transactions.

Yampi Checkout.name: Yampi Checkout
Yampi Checkout.description: Yampi Checkout is an payment processor from Brazil.
